item.description: Contact haruby365@gmail.com Social Blog(Korean) https://blog.naver.com/haruby365 Pixiv http://pixiv.me/haruby ArtStation https://www.artstation.com/haruby Twitter https://twitter.com/haruby365 Others Instagram https://www.instagram.com/haruby365/ GitLab https://gitlab.com/haruby365 GitHub https://github.com/haruby365 Please do not leave comments or send messages to these accounts. Not often monitor them, therefore, you won’t get response in time.

item.title: About - HARUBY
item.description: About Game Engine Programmer & Character illustrator Learned dessin and watercolor. Chemistry major. Developed an Android app detects medical test strip. Self-studied Unreal Engine. From UDK(free version of UE3) Self-studied programming. C/C++, C# and others. x86, Java, Javascript, HTML etc. .NET, Android, Win32, MariaDB etc. DirectX, OpenGL ES, Vulkan Self-developed 2D game engine. Supports Windows, Android and iOS Learned and self-studied character illustration.
